lli Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemens
We have received a notice from Mr. James W. Sawyer of Syracuse
University to the effect that the research data which was
compiled concerning administrative policy and production
procedure of formal courses of instruction by television
is now complete. We would like very much to obtain a copy
of this report. Thank you very much for your consideration.
Sincerely,
Sue Bower
Radio & Television Librarian
